Articles.Content:
Landed on the Mun again today (practice makes perfect)...but I'm pretty sure you aren't supposed to be able to land nearly sideways without the craft rolling over.

You can see that this thing is balancing on 2 legs, with the entire back up off the surface.  I thought maybe it would tip over if Val got out, or it would rebalance itself when she did.  Nope.  Suspended right there.  And what's even more ridiculous about this is that this is on an inclined surface to begin with; the craft should have tipped over as soon as it touched down.
